languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, как выразился бы господин Версериан — невиновных в таких делах не бывает. Кланы подвергают опасности весь корабль, предаваясь распрям из-за странного и явно лживого слуха. Если изволите, позже я передам ваше пожелание блюстителям, но прямо сейчас волнения надо прекратить, а людей — вернуть к их прямым обязанностям или заменить".

"Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, как выразился бы господин Версериан — невиновных в таких делах не бывает. Кланы подвергают опасности весь корабль, предаваясь распрям из-за странного и явно лживого слуха. Если изволите, позже я передам ваше пожелание блюстителям, но прямо сейчас волнения надо прекратить, а людей — вернуть к их прямым обязанностям или заменить".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, as honorable Verserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans endanger the entire voidship, indulging in strife over a strange and obviously false rumor. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the guards later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and people must returned to their direct duties or replaced."

If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the guards later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and people must returned to their direct duties or replaced."

If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the guards later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

"Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

languages.text: “舰长大人，正如韦尔森总领所言，这种情况下根本没有哪个人是无辜的。由于这个明显不可信的谣言，那些氏族争斗不休，对整艘船构成了威胁。如果您愿意的话，我稍后会将您的愿望传达给执法者。但现在，我们必须制止这场动乱，让那些人赶紧回去干活，或是把他们全都换掉。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，正如韦尔森总领所言，这种情况下根本没有哪个人是无辜的。由于这个明显不可信的谣言，那些氏族争斗不休，对整艘船构成了威胁。如果您愿意的话，我稍后会将您的愿望传达给镇压者。但现在，我们必须制止这场动乱，让那些人赶紧回去干活，或是把他们全都换掉。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, como diría el Senescal Werserian, en casos como este no hay inocentes. Los clanes ponen en peligro la nave del vacío entera al pelearse por un rumor extraño y obviamente falaz. Si lo desea, transmitiré sus instrucciones al personal de seguridad más tarde, pero ahora mismo hay que detener los disturbios y hacer que la gente vuelva a su puesto o sustituirla».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, como diría el Senescal Werserian, en casos como este no hay inocentes. Los clanes ponen en peligro la nave del vacío entera al pelearse por un rumor extraño y obviamente falaz. Si lo desea, transmitiré sus instrucciones al personal de seguridad más tarde, pero ahora mismo hay que detener los disturbios y hacer que la gente vuelva a su puesto o sustituirla».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wie Truchsess Werserian sagen würde, gibt es in solchen Fällen keine Unschuldigen. Die Clans gefährden das gesamte Raumschiff, indem sie sich wegen eines seltsamen und offensichtlich falschen Gerüchts streiten. Wenn Ihr es wünscht, werde ich den enforcern später Eure Wünsche übermitteln, aber im Moment müssen die Unruhen beendet und die Leute zu ihren Pflichten zurückgebracht oder ersetzt werden."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, comme le dirait le sénéchal Werserian, nul n'est innocent en pareil cas. Les clans mettent en péril tout le croiseur stellaire en répandant une étrange rumeur manifestement sans fondement. Si vous le souhaitez, je communiquerai votre décision aux prévôts, mais pour l'instant, les troubles doivent être jugulés, et chacun doit retourner à son poste ou être remplacé. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, comme le dirait le sénéchal Werserian, nul n'est innocent en pareil cas. Les clans mettent en péril tout le croiseur stellaire en répandant une étrange rumeur manifestement sans fondement. Si vous le souhaitez, je communiquerai votre décision aux prévôts, mais pour l'instant, les troubles doivent être jugulés, et chacun doit retourner à son poste ou être remplacé. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ウェルザリアン家令長の言葉通り、こういった件で無実の者はいません。一族はどう考えてもデタラメでおかしな噂をめぐって争い、ヴォイドシップ全体を危険にさらしています。ご希望とあれば、後ほどエンフォーサーにあなたの要望を伝えましょう。しかし今すぐに動揺を抑え込んで、民が受け持つ任務に戻すか、代わりを見つけなければいけません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ウェルザリアン家令長の言葉通り、こういった件で無実の者はいません。一族はどう考えてもデタラメでおかしな噂をめぐって争い、ヴォイドシップ全体を危険にさらしています。ご希望とあれば、後ほどエンフォーサーにあなたの要望を伝えましょう。しかし今すぐに動揺を抑え込んで、民が受け持つ任務に戻すか、代わりを見つけなければいけません」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Seneşal Werserian'ın da dediği üzere böylesi durumlarda masum kimse yoktur. Klanlar, uçsuz gemisinin tamamını tehlikeye atıyor. Yalan olduğu belli, tuhaf bir söylentiye zaman harcıyoruz. Dilerseniz isteklerinizi infazcılara daha sonra ileteyim ama şu an için huzursuzluğa bir son verilmeli ve insanlar ya vazifelerine geri dönmeli ya da onların yerlerine başkaları atanmalı."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, as Seneschal Werserian would say, there are no innocents in such cases. The clans are endangering the entire voidship, tussling over a strange and obviously false rumour. If you so desire, I will convey your wishes to the enforcers later, but right now the unrest must be stopped, and the people returned to their direct duties or replaced."
